turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need a venti caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you wanted to pick up at starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. The one on Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, just to confirm your order, i got venti caramel macchiato with whole milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caramel macchiato with whole milk to be picked up at the starbucks on main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
